Civilian Occupation Title: Commissioned officers of the Canadian Armed Forces
Role Description: Plans and leads armoured fighting vehicle operations and integrates reconnaissance intelligence for battle group commanders.

Civilian Occupation Title: Non-commissioned ranks of the Canadian Armed Forces
Role Description: Provides close combat capabilities, tactical security, and small-unit leadership in austere environments.

Civilian Occupation Title: Air traffic controllers and related occupations
Role Description: Maintains airspace surveillance, coordinates aircraft movements, and relays critical flight information from control centres.

Civilian Occupation Title: Computer engineers (except software engineers and designers)
Role Description: Designs, deploys, and safeguards tactical and strategic communications networks for CAF operations.

Civilian Occupation Title: Other technical occupations in air traffic control and related operations
Role Description: Operates shipboard sensors, fuses radar tracks, and briefs command teams on maritime situational awareness.
